rebel.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: someone who opposes or fights against people in authority
rebel.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: someone who refuses to do things in the normal way, or in the way that other people want them to
rebel.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Alex has always been a bit of a rebel.
rebel.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to oppose or fight against someone in authority or against an idea or situation which you do not agree with
rebel.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: teenage boys rebelling against their parents
rebel.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: if your stomach, legs, mind etc rebel, you cannot do or believe something you think you should
rebel.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: He knew he ought to eat, but his stomach rebelled.
